title: Sheet Pan Maple-Teriyaki Salmon & Veggies
description: One-pan salmon dinner with maple-soy glaze and roasted vegetables.
instructions: Whisk soy sauce, maple syrup, ginger, and rice vinegar for glaze.
Toss veggies with olive oil and spread on a lined sheet pan.
Nestle salmon among veggies, brush with glaze.
Bake 15–20 minutes, until salmon flakes easily.
notes: Serve over rice or quinoa. Leftovers make great lunch bowls.
